services.title: Web Design
services.description: I create clean, modern, and responsive websites that work seamlessly on mobile, tablet, and desktop.I design landing pages, portfolio sites, and other personal or small business websites using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.

services.title: Web Maintenance & Updates
services.description: I help update existing websites by adjusting text, images, layout, and fixing bugs in HTML/CSS.

services.title: SEO-Ready Structure
services.description: I build websites with proper use of headings, meta tags, and alt text for images. My code is lightweight and optimized for faster page loading, supporting better visibility on search engines.

services.title: Design to data conversion
services.description: I convert visual designs (from Figma, Adobe XD, or Canva) into working, responsive web pages that match the original design closely
